column4: How do I know the last Eclipse version available for Ubuntu ?
how do I download it? I am facing some troubles on my actual version
it's 3.2, and upstream latest is 3.5. I'd recommend downloading it and placing it in /usr/local/lib/eclipse/
visit eclipse.org for help downloading it. Pick the linux version for your architecture, download it, untar it, and mv it to /usr/local/lib/
